import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Monday } from '../monday'; import { MondayService } from '../monday.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-monday-list', templateUrl: './monday-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./monday-list.component.css'] }) export class MondayListComponent implements OnInit { pageTitle = 'Monday List'; filteredMondays: Monday[] = []; mondays: Monday[] = []; errorMessage = ''; _listFilter = ''; get listFilter(): string { return this._listFilter; } set listFilter(value: string) { this._listFilter = value; this.filteredMondays = this.listFilter ? this.performFilter(this.listFilter) : this.mondays; } constructor(private mondayService: MondayService) { } performFilter(filterBy: string): Monday[] { filterBy = filterBy.toLocaleLowerCase(); return this.mondays.filter((monday: Monday) => monday.name.toLocaleLowerCase().indexOf(filterBy) !== -1); } ngOnInit(): void { this.getMondayData(); } getMondayData() { this.mondayService.getMondays() .subscribe({ next: (mondays) => { this.mondays = mondays; this.filteredMondays = mondays; }, error: (err) => this.errorMessage = err, complete: () => console.info('Get mondays in monday list') }); } }
